description: Curated LCI data for primary and secondary copper production. GWP values are disaggregated.

processes.name: Primary Copper Cathode
processes.description: Cradle-to-gate production of 1kg of primary copper cathode from ore concentrate.
processes.source_citation: Aggregated from International Copper Association (ICA) reports and Ecoinvent averages. gCO2_per_kg for direct smelting/refining emissions.

processes.name: Recycled Copper Cathode
processes.description: Cradle-to-gate production of 1kg of recycled (secondary) copper cathode from high-grade scrap.
processes.source_citation: Based on ~80% energy savings principle vs primary (ICA). gCO2_per_kg for direct remelting/refining emissions.
